item.description:
Our next meeting will be on a THURSDAY  June 9 at 7 PM.

I am asking everyone to rethink what the group means to them, what they would like to get out of the group that they are not currently getting, and what you can bring to the group to help make it better.

I have been looking for a new meeting place (to keep my costs down) that is quiet, free and close to where I work but haven't been successful to date. It needs to be very close as I often work until 6:30 on weeknights.

I am also wondering if anyone in the group would like to volunteer to be a group coordinator and run an occasional meeting? This summer I will be coming back only once in August as I have a few conferences to attend and a lot of leg work to accomplish for my Fibro workshop series.

Anyway send any comments to me Betsy at btzee6@gmail.com.

Finally I want to start promoting my Fibromyalgia workshops more in the Boston area.  If anyone has suggestions of a possible group or place to contact for such a 2 hour Recovery from Fibro class let me know your ideas.

See you in June.

 

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs. There is an elevator on the right as you come in on the first level
item.name: Meet in June
